description:
There are many classic games available online for free. Here are some popular options:

1. Pac-Man: This iconic arcade game can be played for free on websites like Pac-Man.io or FreePacMan.org.

2. Tetris: This classic puzzle game can be played for free on sites like Tetris.com or FreeTetris.org.

3. Super Mario Bros.: This classic platformer can be played for free on sites like MarioGames.com or ClassicGamesArcade.com.

4. Pong: This simple but addictive game can be played for free on sites like PongGame.org or ClassicGamesArcade.com.

5. Donkey Kong: This classic arcade game can be played for free on sites like ClassicGamesArcade.com or Donkey-Kong.org.

6. Space Invaders: This iconic arcade game can be played for free on sites like ClassicGamesArcade.com or SpaceInvadersOnline.com.

7. Frogger: This classic arcade game can be played for free on sites like ClassicGamesArcade.com or Frogger.net.

8. Galaga: This classic arcade game can be played for free on sites like ClassicGamesArcade.com or Galaga.co.

These are just a few examples of the many classic games available to play for free online.
name: Classic Games
